EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
1. CABLE OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY CABLESHIP LAYLA IN AREA BOUND BY
   45-46N 008-00W, 45-44N 007-56W,
   45-14N 008-27W, 45-08N 008-46W,
   45-10N 008-50W, 45-22N 008-39W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3090/18.
